product_description: AMCE GREEK SALAD AUTHENTIC FS, Refrigerated, packaged in clear plastic container, sold by pound, UPC 293070 #####  READY MEALS GREEK SALAD SS, Refrigerated, packaged in clear plastic container, sold by pound, UPC 292483 #####  Star Market GREEK SALAD  FS, Refrigerated, packaged in clear plastic container, sold by pound, UPC 292329 #####

product_description: Trader Joe's Hot Honey Mustard Dressing (SKU #80152), packaged in glass bottle with tamper overwrap on plastic cap, net wt. 12 fl. oz. UPC 0080 1522. DIST. & SOLD Exclusively by: Trader Joe's Monrovia, CA.  These 12oz. bottles were sold directly to consumers.  The master cases were correctly labeled as Thai Style Peanut Dressing. Any 12oz. bottles labeled as Hot Honey Mustard Dressing with the use by date of 5/27/25, which contains Thai Style Peanut Dressing product inside, are subject to this recall.  Master cases were not sold to consumers.
reason_for_recall: Undeclared peanuts, soy, sesame, and wheat.
code_info: Use By Date of 05/27/2025.  Any bottles labeled as Hot Honey Mustard Dressing with the use by date of 5/27/25 are subject to recall.
